revised_title: Stability and Complex Balancing in Mass-Action Systems with Three Short Complexes: A Comprehensive Analysis
tldr: The authors analyze mass-action systems with three short complexes, focusing on their stability and complex balancing. They show that 41 out of 43 isomorphism classes of these systems are non-deficient and exhibit dynamic regularity. The two exceptional cases are investigated for their necessary and sufficient conditions for complex balancing and their quasi-thermostatic and quasi-thermodynamic behavior.
